thoughts: Is watching the rest of the Clan eat
Is sitting alone
Doesn't like sleeping at the edge of camp
Considers pleading insanity
Is hiding behind a tree
Hopes they'll get into StarClan
Is looking sad
Had to sleep in the rain last night
Draws in the dirt with their claws
Got a dirty look from r_c
Tries to enjoy the stale prey they've been granted
Is dreading the future
Is cursing the consequences of their actions
Wants to share tongues with their clanmates again
Plays mossball with themselves
Is thinking about their decisions
Bitterly watches the Clan around them
Is not regretting their actions, not at all
Hisses at any cat who dares come near
Wishes the Clan understood their side of the story
Is growing frustrated and hateful
Swears StarClan made them do it
Despises the Clan's eyes following their every move
Hides away from the clan
Isn't handling this well
Is bored!
Tried to sneak some fresh prey
Wonders if they'd be accepted into o_cClan
Begs r_c to look at them, please just look at them
Wonders how long until they'll be accepted back into the Clan
Is growing to resent their Clanmates
Will never forget how they've been treated by their own clanmates
Is given a piece of prey that r_c spat in
Is planning, plotting, observing...
Digs their claws into the dirt as r_c walks by
Thinks they did nothing wrong
Feels a pit of guilt in their stomach
Is pleading for forgiveness to any cat who would listen
Had a nightmare about what they did
Insists, deep down, they're not a bad cat
